color.description: The background color of the Badge. Equivalent to setting the --color CSS variable.
color.description_zh: The background color of the Badge. Equivalent to setting the --color CSS variable.

content.description: The content of the Badge: if null undefined '' or nothing is passed, it would not be displayed; if Badge.dot is passed, a small red dot would be displayed
content.description_zh: The content of the Badge: if null undefined '' or nothing is passed, it would not be displayed; if Badge.dot is passed, a small red dot would be displayed
